result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Aimee Catherine Thomas

records.addlTxt:
It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Walmart in Hudson WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

2:48 PM Apprs: Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann for S. Needham, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: B Harris, Defendant Aimee Catherine Thomas in court.  Attorney Travis Satorius appeared by video for Aimee Catherine Thomas.  Prosecuting attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for the State of Wisconsin.  DE qualifies for PD. Court informs def of charges, Waives reading. Bond argument.  Court orders bond and schedules next court date. Adjourned at 2:51 PM. bph
Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on December 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
filed by DA's office on behalf of VW. bph
